notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: All data used in this study can be downloaded from the following organizations: ICAO (International Civil Aviation Organization; http://www.icao.int/Pages/default.aspx), United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD; http://unctadstat.unctad.org/EN/Index.html), UN World Population Prospects database ( http://www.un.org/en/development/desa/population/), UN Statistics Division ([ https://unstats.un.org< https://unstats.un.org/>).] https://unstats.un.org< https://unstats.un.org/>).
